<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Petal Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=967)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 121 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 15-foot radius burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You bring forth a cloud of razor-sharp flower petals that thrash violently in the wind. A creature that enters the storm or starts its turn in the storm is sliced by the razor-sharp edges of the petals. It takes 2d10 slashing damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. A creature can take damage from the petals only once per round. At the end of the duration, the storm calms and the petals fall harmlessly to the ground.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d10.
name: Petal Storm
